creator: andre.steffens@postadress.de
text:
I've installed the php4apache2.dll and mod_ssl.so!

The Apache2 server crashs with the following error message:

Parent: child process exited with status 3221225477 (or 1073807364) --
Restarting.

I've the same problem with older PHP and older Apache2 versions too.

The problem is that sometimes the server is killed and I had to restart.
Also the server get's sometimes very slow or hang.

This is almost definitely a PHP bug, and as such should be reported as a problem
in the PHP bug database at bugs.php.net.
Thanks for using Apache2.
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
